item.title: How to attach admin crown to player rights 4 (pi)
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Like title says, im having a bit of trouble.

atm in rs2loginprotocoldecoder in StaticPacketBuilder bldr = new StaticPacketBuilder(); bldr.setBare(true); bldr.addByte((byte) returnCode); if(returnCode == 2) { cl.saveCharacter = true; bldr.addByte(cl.playerRights == 3 || cl.playerRights == 4 ? (byte) 2 : (byte) cl.playerRights); } else if(returnCode == 21) bldr.addByte((byte) loginDelay);

i add || cl.playerRights == 4, however this makes the crown only appear to the person with playerrights 4 and doesnt show to anyone else

Read full topic
item.source: How to attach admin crown to player rights 4 (pi)
